import React from'react';import'./PasswordStrengthMeter.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PasswordStrengthMeter=_ref=>{let{password}=_ref;const calculateStrength=password=>{let strength=0;if(password.length===0)return strength;//Password not entered
